cards.title: Panicked Pilot
cards.text: Gain 2 stress tokens. Then repair this card.

cards.title: Blinded Pilot
cards.text: While you perform an attack, you can modify your dice only by spending [Force] for their default effect. Action: Repair this card.

cards.title: Wounded Pilot
cards.text: After you perform an atcion, roll 1 attack die. On a [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result, gain 1 stress token. Action: Repair this card.

cards.title: Stunned Pilot
cards.text: After you execute a maneuver, if you moved through or overlapped an obstacle, suffer 1 [Hit] damage.

cards.title: Console Fire
cards.text: Before you engage, roll 1 attack die. On a [Hit] result, suffer 1 [Hit] damage. Action: Repair this card.

cards.title: Damaged Engine
cards.text: Increase the difficulty of you turn maneuvers ([Turn Left] and [Turn Right]).

cards.title: Weapons Failure
cards.text: While you perform an attack, roll 1 fewer attack die. Action: Repair this card.

cards.title: Hull Breach
cards.text: Before you would suffer 1 or more [Hit] damage, suffer that much [Critical Hit] damage instead. Action: Repair this card.

cards.title: Structural Damage
cards.text: While you defend, roll 1 fewer defense die.

cards.title: Damaged Sensor Array
cards.text: You cannot perform any actions except the [Focus] action and actions from damage cards. Action: Repair this card.

cards.title: Loose Stabilizer
cards.text: After you execute a non-straight maneuver ([Straight]), suffer 1 [Hit] damage and repair this card. Action: Repair this card.

cards.title: Disabled Power Regulator
cards.text: Before you engage, gain 1 ion token. After you execute an ion maneuver, repair this card.

cards.title: Fuel Leak
cards.text: After you suffer 1 [Critical Hit] damage, suffer 1 [Hit] damage and repair this card. Action: Repair this card.

cards.title: Direct Hit!
cards.text: Suffer 1 [Hit] damage. Then repair this card.

device.name: Bomblet
device.effect: At the end of the Activation Phase, this device detonates. When this device detonates, each ship at range 0-1 rolls 2 attack dice. Each ship suffers 1 [Hit] damage for each [Hit]/[Critical Hit] result.

device.name: Conner Net
device.effect: After a ship overlaps or moves through this device, it detonates. When this device detonates, the ship suffers 1 [Hit] damage and gains 3 ion tokens.

device.name: Proton Bomb
device.effect: At the end of the Activation Phase, this device detonates. When this device detonates, each ship at range 0-1 suffers 1 [Critical Hit] damage.

device.name: Proximity Mine
device.effect: After a ship overlaps or moves through this device, it detonates. When this device detonates, that ship rolls 2 attack dice. That ship then suffers 1 [Hit] damage plus 1 [Hit]/[Critical Hit] damage for each matching result.

device.name: Seismic Charge
device.effect: At the end of the Activation Phase, this device detonates. When this device detonates, choose 1 obstacle at range 0-1. Each ship at range 0-1 of the obstacle suffers 1 [Hit] damage. Then remove that obstacle.

device.name: Loose Cargo
device.effect: Loose cargo is a debris cloud.

conditions.name: Hunted
conditions.ability: After you are destroyed, you must choose another friendly ship and assign this condition to it, if able.

conditions.name: I'll Show You the Dark Side
conditions.ability: When this card is assigned, if there is no faceup damage card on it, the player who assigned it searches the damage deck for 1 Pilot damage card and places it faceup on this card. Then shuffle the damage deck. When you would suffer 1 [Critical Hit] damage, you are instead dealt the faceup damage card on this card. Then, remove this card.

conditions.name: Listening Device
conditions.ability: During the System Phase, if an enemy ship with the Informant upgrade is at range 0-2, flip your dial faceup.

conditions.name: Optimized Prototype
conditions.ability: While you perform a [Front Arc] primary attack against a ship locked by a friendly ship with the Director Krennic upgrade, you may spend 1 [Hit], [Critical Hit], or [Focus] result. If you do, choose one: the defender loses 1 shield, or the defender flips 1 of its facedown damage cards.

conditions.name: Rattled
conditions.ability: After a bomb or mine at range 0-1 detonates, suffer 1 [Critical Hit] damage. Then, remove this card. ACTION: If there are no bombs or mines at range 0-1, remove this card.

conditions.name: Suppressive Fire
conditions.ability: While you perform an attack against a ship other than Captain Rex, roll 1 fewer attack die. After Captain Rex defends, remove this card. At the end of the Combat phase, if Captain Rex did not perform an attack this phase, remove this card. After Captain Rex is destroyed, remove this card.
